entry.title: 2021-10-26: Error Messages in Relational Database Systems
entry.content: When I was first introduced to SQL in my undergraduate database course, we were trained on an Oracle SQL instance. Taipalus2021 provides evidence that I may have been just a bit happier had we used PostgreSQL instead. Taipalus2021 studied how choice of database management system (DBMS) affected the effectiveness and subjective experience of novices when correcting SQL syntax errors.
